bug.author: sidray7965
bug.summary: kfctl.sh generate all fails in AKS (Azure)
bug.description:
/kind bug
[A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] I created a AKS cluster and followed the steps in the link below to deploy Kubeflow: <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/azure/deploy/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/azure/deploy/</denchmark-link>
What did you expect to happen: <denchmark-h:h1>Generate and deploy the app:</denchmark-h>
cd ${KFAPP} kfctl generate all -V [sidray@sids-mbp app]$ kfctl generate all -V
ENV_FILE=env.sh SKIP_INIT_PROJECT=false GKE_API_VERSION=v1beta1 GCP_DEFAULT_ZONE=us-east1-d +++ dirname /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts/kfctl.sh ++ cd /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts ++ pwd DIR=/Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts source /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts/util.sh source /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts/gke/util.sh ++ set -xe source /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts/azure/util.sh ++ set -xe source /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts/aws/util.sh ++ set -xe source /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/scripts/util-minikube.sh ++ RED='\033[0;31m' ++ GREEN='\033[0;32m' ++ YELLOW='\033[0;33m' ++ NC='\033[0m' ++ MOUNT_LOCAL=false INPUT=() FORMAT=() export 'KUBEFLOW_COMPONENTS="ambassador","jupyter","notebook-controller","jupyter-web-app","profiles","centraldashboard","tf-job-operator","pytorch-operator","spartakus","argo","pipeline"' KUBEFLOW_COMPONENTS='"ambassador","jupyter","notebook-controller","jupyter-web-app","profiles","centraldashboard","tf-job-operator","pytorch-operator","spartakus","argo","pipeline"' export KUBEFLOW_EXTENDEDINFO=false KUBEFLOW_EXTENDEDINFO=false which envsubst [[ 3 -lt 2 ]] COMMAND=generate WHAT=all shift shift main -V [[ generate == \i\n\i\t ]] source env.sh ++ PLATFORM=null ++ KUBEFLOW_REPO=/Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0 ++ KUBEFLOW_VERSION=master ++ KUBEFLOW_COMPONENTS='"ambassador","jupyter","notebook-controller","jupyter-web-app","profiles","centraldashboard","tf-job-operator","pytorch-operator","spartakus","argo","pipeline"' ++ KUBEFLOW_EXTENDEDINFO=false ++ KUBEFLOW_KS_DIR=/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app ++ KUBEFLOW_DOCKER_REGISTRY= ++ DOCKER_REGISTRY_KATIB_NAMESPACE= ++ K8S_NAMESPACE=kubeflow ++ KUBEFLOW_PLATFORM=null ++ MOUNT_LOCAL=false ++ DEPLOYMENT_NAME=app [[ -z generate ]] [[ -z all ]] check_installed_deps kf_deps=("ks" "kubectl") declare -a kf_deps kf_dep=ks min_ks_ver=0.11.0 ++ ks version ++ cut '-d ' -f3 ++ head -1 ks_ver=0.13.1 '[' 0.13.1 '<' 0.11.0 ']' [[ null == \g\c\p ]] [[ null == \a\z\u\r\e ]] [[ null == \a\w\s ]] [[ generate == \g\e\n\e\r\a\t\e ]] [[ all == \p\l\a\t\f\o\r\m ]] [[ all == \a\l\l ]] [[ null == \g\c\p ]] [[ null == \a\z\u\r\e ]] [[ null == \a\w\s ]] [[ all == \k\8\s ]] [[ all == \a\l\l ]] createKsApp pushd . ~/Documents/app ~/Documents/app ++ dirname /Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app cd /Users/sidray/Documents/app ++ basename /Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app eval ks init ks_app --skip-default-registries ++ ks init ks_app --skip-default-registries INFO Using context "AKS-ML" from kubeconfig file "/Users/sidray/.kube/config" INFO Creating environment "default" with namespace "default", pointing to "version:v1.12.8" cluster at address "https://aks-ml-dns-08962ef7.hcp.westus.azmk8s.io:443" INFO Generating ksonnet-lib data at path '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/lib/ksonnet-lib/v1.12.8' cd /Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app ks env rm default INFO Deleting environment "default" with metadata at path "/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/environments/default" INFO Successfully removed environment 'default' ks registry add kubeflow /Users/sidray/Documents/kubeflow-0.6.0/kubeflow ks pkg install kubeflow/argo INFO Retrieved 6 files ks pkg install kubeflow/pipeline INFO Retrieved 15 files ks pkg install kubeflow/common INFO Retrieved 22 files ks pkg install kubeflow/examples INFO Retrieved 9 files ks pkg install kubeflow/jupyter INFO Retrieved 49 files ks pkg install kubeflow/katib INFO Retrieved 7 files ks pkg install kubeflow/mpi-job INFO Retrieved 9 files ks pkg install kubeflow/pytorch-job INFO Retrieved 6 files ks pkg install kubeflow/seldon INFO Retrieved 17 files ks pkg install kubeflow/tf-serving INFO Retrieved 12 files ks pkg install kubeflow/openvino INFO Retrieved 4 files ks pkg install kubeflow/tensorboard INFO Retrieved 8 files ks pkg install kubeflow/tf-training INFO Retrieved 4 files ks pkg install kubeflow/metacontroller INFO Retrieved 4 files ks pkg install kubeflow/profiles INFO Retrieved 18 files ks pkg install kubeflow/application INFO Retrieved 9 files ks pkg install kubeflow/modeldb INFO Retrieved 4 files ks generate pytorch-operator pytorch-operator INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/pytorch-operator.jsonnet' ks generate ambassador ambassador INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/ambassador.jsonnet' ks generate openvino openvino INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/openvino.jsonnet' ks generate jupyter jupyter INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/jupyter.jsonnet' ks generate notebook-controller notebook-controller INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/notebook-controller.jsonnet' ks generate jupyter-web-app jupyter-web-app --injectIstio false INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/jupyter-web-app.jsonnet' ks generate centraldashboard centraldashboard --injectIstio false INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/centraldashboard.jsonnet' ks generate tf-job-operator tf-job-operator --injectIstio false INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/tf-job-operator.jsonnet' ks generate tensorboard tensorboard --injectIstio false INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/tensorboard.jsonnet' ks generate metacontroller metacontroller INFO Writing component at '/Users/sidray/Documents/app/ks_app/components/metacontroller.jsonnet' ks generate profiles profiles ERROR failed to instantiate prototype "io.ksonnet.pkg.profiles". The following required parameters are missing: --admin= cluster admin user id [type: string]
[Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] I also created a cluster role binding: kubectl create clusterrolebinding default-admin --clusterrole=cluster-admin --user=<denchmark-link:mailto:sidd.ray@citrix.com>sidd.ray@citrix.com</denchmark-link>
And ran the generate command as below: kfctl generate all -V --admin="<denchmark-link:mailto:sidd.ray@citrix.com>sidd.ray@citrix.com</denchmark-link> " The same error is generated. Environment:
Kubeflow version:kubeflow-0.6.0
kfctl version: (use kfctl version):
Kubernetes platform: AKS (Azure)
Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"14", GitVersion:"v1.14.1", GitCommit:"b7394102d6ef778017f2ca4046abbaa23b88c290", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-04-08T17:11:31Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12", GitVersion:"v1.12.8", GitCommit:"a89f8c11a5f4f132503edbc4918c98518fd504e3", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-04-23T04:41:47Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.8", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Darwin sids-mbp.citrite.net 17.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 17.7.0: Wed Apr 24 21:17:24 PDT 2019; root:xnu-4570.71.45~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
This issue is resolved with the latest release: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/releases/tag/v0.6.1>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/releases/tag/v0.6.1</denchmark-link>
Please feel free to close this issue.
